segments.text: My eyes are drawn to the boy precariously balanced on that stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's really stretching, reaching for the cookie jar inside the open cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks so unstable, with its legs splayed out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can clearly see it's tilted, just on the verge of tipping backward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Itâ€™s a wonder he hasn't fallen already.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's got one hand deep in the cookie jar, and the other holding a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I suppose the plate is either a lid or a catcher for his pilfered treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This little adventure seems highly risky for a simple snack.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I truly hope that stool doesn't give way under him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A fall from that height could really hurt him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His parents would be furious if they saw this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What an incredibly dangerous situation for a few cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR
